          <title>
            <string language="sv">Beende hinduer</string>
            <string language="en">Praying Hindus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betende Hindus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hindous de Prière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hindus Praying</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hindus Di Preghiera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίκληση Hindus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hindus De Rogación</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Fyra män ligger på mage och tillber en gud i hinudiskt tempel.</string>
            <string language="en">Four men lie on their stomachs and pray to a god at a Hindu temple.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">religion</string>
            <string language="en">religion</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sv">be</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lüge mit vier Männern auf ihren Mägen und 
beten zu einem Gott an einem hinduistischen Bügel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mensonge de quatre hommes sur leurs estomacs et
prient à un dieu à un temple indou.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma mentira de quatro homens em seus estômagos e 
pray a um deus em um temple hindu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una bugia dei quattro uomini sui loro stomaci e 
prega ad un dio ad un tempiale indù.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέσσερα άτομα βρίσκονται στα στομάχια τους και 
προσεύχονται σε έναν Θεό σε έναν ινδό ναό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La mentira de cuatro hombres en sus estómagos y 
ruega a un dios en un templo hindú.</string>
          </description>
